testcase.classname: To Validate The Overall Functionality Of Hotel Booking on Adacitin Application
testcase.name: To check valid data in mandatory filed
testcase.system-out: When To Launch The Url of Adacitin Appln....................................passed And To Pass The Valid Username and Password.................................passed And Check Whether Submit button Click or Not................................passed And the user has to select the location in a particular filed...............passed And the user has to choose how many children in a particular filed and click the search btn.passed And User has to select the hotelroom and cilck the continue btn.............passed And user has to pass firstname and lastname in particular filed.............passed And user has to give their address in particular filed......................passed And user has to pass the 16digits credircard number and select the cardtype.passed And user has to pass the expri month&year details in particular filed.......passed And user has to give the ccv number of card and click the booknow btn.......passed And user check whether see the order no or not , then orderno print in consloe when order no get.passed
